inputs.prompt: A cinematic, over-the-shoulder shot of a modern military conflict in a vast, arid desert landscape. The foreground is heavily blurred, showing the back of a soldier's camouflaged helmet and weapon, creating a first-person perspective from behind rocky cover. In the sun-drenched midground, soldiers in full desert combat gear are positioned around armored tanks on the sandy terrain; one soldier is crouched and aiming their rifle. A large, violent explosion erupts with orange fire and billowing tan smoke behind the central tank. In the far background, a range of rugged, snow-capped mountains rises against a clear, bright teal-blue sky. The image has a shallow depth of field, a distinct teal-and-orange cinematic color grade, and a tense, action-packed atmosphere.
